allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add stand booking system MVP with daily calendar and conflict detection

Implement a complete booking system for hunting stand reservations with real-time updates, conflict detection, and user-friendly calendar interface.

Features:
- Daily calendar view showing all stands with morning/evening hunt splits
- Create booking form with stand selection, date picker, and time slot options
- My bookings page with upcoming/past/cancelled filters and check-in/check-out
- Real-time Firestore listeners for live booking updates
- Conflict detection algorithm preventing double-bookings
- Time validation \(morning 5am-11am, evening 3pm-8pm, all-day 5am-8pm\)

Technical implementation:
- Custom useBookings React hook with full CRUD operations
- Booking validation and helper utilities \(bookingHelpers.ts\)
- TypeScript interfaces for type safety
- Firestore composite indexes for optimized queries
- Security rules for booking collection
- "Stand Board" navigation link with Calendar icon
- Fixed layout padding to prevent navbar overlap \(pt-24\)

Files added:
- src/pages/BookingsPage.tsx - Daily calendar view
- src/pages/NewBookingPage.tsx - Create booking form
- src/pages/MyBookingsPage.tsx - User booking management
- src/hooks/useBookings.ts - Booking data and CRUD operations
- src/utils/bookingHelpers.ts - Validation and conflict detection
- src/types/index.ts - TypeScript type definitions
- firestore.indexes.json - Database query optimization

Files modified:
- src/App.tsx - Added booking routes and layout padding fix
- src/components/Navbar.tsx - Added Stand Board navigation link

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
